actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to provide assistance relating to water resource protection and development in Pennsylvania, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Comprehensive Water Resource Development Act - Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to establish a program to provide design and construction assistance to non-federal interests for water-related environmental infrastructure, resource protection and development, flood damage reduction, and ecosystem restoration projects in Pennsylvania.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to provide assistance relating to water resource protection and development in Pennsylvania, and for other purposes.
